message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,600,000. I believe it's a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,400,000. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  $1,450,000 is the absolute lowest I can go at this point. This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. Let me know your thoughts.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I can't agree to $1,450,000. I would like to propose $1,425,000 as a compromise. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
